thread.title: Little-known Guangzhou balances China’s past and future
thread.title_full: Little-known Guangzhou balances China’s past and future - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Spud Hilton
title: Little-known Guangzhou balances China’s past and future
text:
Photo: Spud Hilton Public art is increasing common in and around the central business district, known as Zhujiang New Town. Public art is increasing common in and around the central business...
Studying geopolitical economics was never a goal of mine, and I’m certainly not an expert in Chinese history, but I’m pretty sure there’s nothing in Chairman Mao’s Little Red Book about waltzing.
